summary: API to query seller transaction details within specific date range
description: API to query seller transaction details within specific date range.

query.name: offset
query.description: Number of transaction lines to skip at the beginning of the list.

query.name: limit
query.description: Number of lines of transactions to be extracted. The supported maximum number is 500.

query.name: start_time
query.description: Starting date when transactions need to be extracted.

query.name: end_time
query.description: Ending date when transactions need to be extracted.

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/finance/transaction/details/get','GET')
request.add_api_parameter("offset", "0")
request.add_api_parameter("trans_type", "-1")
request.add_api_parameter("trade_order_id", "123123213213")
request.add_api_parameter("limit", "100")
request.add_api_parameter("start_time", "2021-01-01")
request.add_api_parameter("end_time", "2021-01-05")
request.add_api_parameter("trade_order_line_id", "45645674566")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/finance/transaction/details/get','GET')
request.add_api_param('offset', '0')
request.add_api_param('trans_type', '-1')
request.add_api_param('trade_order_id', '123123213213')
request.add_api_param('limit', '100')
request.add_api_param('start_time', '2021-01-01')
request.add_api_param('end_time', '2021-01-05')
request.add_api_param('trade_order_line_id', '45645674566')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)
